updateVmsProcessing

public double updateVmsProcessing(double currentTime)
Description copied from class: Host
Requests updating of processing of cloudlets in the VMs running in this host.

Overrides:
updateVmsProcessing in class Host
Parameters:
currentTime - the current time
Returns:
expected time of completion of the next cloudlet in all VMs in this host. Double.MAX_VALUE if there is no future events expected in this host
